title: Polish UX to Apple quality
description:
Elevate the current functional MVP to Apple-quality UX:

- Motion design system (spring animations, gesture physics)
- Micro-interactions (haptic feedback, satisfying hover states)
- Typography refinement (perfect hierarchy, optical adjustments)
- Delightful empty states with illustrations
- Graceful error handling (no raw technical errors)
- Skeleton loading states
- Onboarding flow for new users
- Full accessibility (VoiceOver, keyboard nav, reduced motion)
- Mobile-first responsive (44pt touch targets)
- Graph improvements: force simulation, minimap, search, fit-to-view
- Sound design (optional subtle audio feedback)
- User testing and iteration

title: Visual drag preview for dependencies
description: When dragging to create dependency, show preview line. Visual feedback before committing.

title: Build human issue tracker app with AI-powered relationships
description:
Create a web/macOS/iOS issue tracker for humans with:
- Apple-quality UX (must be tested and evaluated like code)
- Relationship management (dependencies, blocking) like bd
- AI-powered relationship detection that suggests relationships and only asks for confirmation when uncertain

Key requirements:
1. Choose easiest platform (likely web app)
2. UX testing integrated into quality gates
3. AI inference for relationship suggestions
close_reason: Implemented human issue tracker web app with SvelteKit, Tailwind CSS, localStorage persistence, and Claude API integration for AI-powered relationship suggestions

close_reason: Graph is now the default view on main page with toggle to list view
